attributes.action: support a bid by the students of De Montfort University to host either the 2016 Olympic Games or the 2014 Commonwealth Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
De Montfort University is in vital need of improved sporting facilities

East London was in vital need of improved sporting facilities.

The International Olympic Committee saw the opportunity to host a fantastic games in East London and leave a sporting legacy...

We hope to persuade them that such an opportunity exists for them at De Montfort; since our University will not invest in modern sportng facilities.

Please petition the Prime Minister to lend his support to a DMU Games in the year 2016
